tool.name: Remove Spikes
tool.description: Remove synthetic template reads from fastqs

param.name: reads_to_remove
param.label: Reads to Remove
param.help: Fastq read ids of synthetic templates. Produced by count spikes with 9 bp spike

tool.help: This tool takes an input file containing all of the fastq read ids for the synthetic templates from a particular sample and removes the read from the corresponding fastq file. It outputs the new fastq sample file w/o these template reads, as well as a fastq file containing the template reads.
